Function	Microtubule-stabilizing protein that plays a role in the control of cell motility and neurite outgrowth via direct binding to the microtubule (By similarity). Acts as a critical cofactor for kinesin transport. In the proximal axon, regulates kinesin-1 family members, KIF5A, KIF5B and KIF5C recruitment to microtubules and contributes to kinesin-1-mediated transport in the axons (By similarity).
